sentences.chinese: 子家曰：「棄周公之業而臣於齊，可乎？」
sentences.literal: Zi Jia said: 'Abandon Zhou Gong legacy and serve as minister at Qi, permissible?'
sentences.idiomatic: Zi Jia said: "To abandon the Duke of Zhou's legacy and serve as minister to Qi, is this permissible?"

sentences.chinese: 子家曰：「齊景公無信，不如早之晉。」
sentences.literal: Zi Jia said: 'Qi Jing Gong no trustworthiness, not as good early go Jin.'
sentences.idiomatic: Zi Jia said: "Duke Jing of Qi has no trustworthiness. It would be better to go to Jin early."

sentences.chinese: 叔孫見公還，見平子，平子頓首。
sentences.literal: Shu Sun saw duke returned, saw Ping Zi, Ping Zi bowed head ground.
sentences.idiomatic: Shu Sun saw the duke return. He saw Ping Zi. Ping Zi bowed his head to the ground.

sentences.chinese: 初欲迎昭公，孟孫、季孫後悔，乃止。
sentences.literal: Initially wished welcome Zhao Gong, Meng Sun, Ji Sun later regretted, then stopped.
sentences.idiomatic: At first they wished to welcome Duke Zhao. Meng Sun and Ji Sun later regretted it, so they stopped.

sentences.chinese: 二十六年春，齊伐魯，取鄆而居昭公焉。
sentences.literal: Twenty-sixth year spring, Qi attacked Lu, seized Yun and housed Zhao Gong there.
sentences.idiomatic: In the twenty-sixth year, in spring, Qi attacked Lu, seized Yun and housed Duke Zhao there.

sentences.chinese: 夏，齊景公將內公，令無受魯賂。
sentences.literal: Summer, Qi Jing Gong about to restore duke, ordered not accept Lu bribes.
sentences.idiomatic: In summer, Duke Jing of Qi was about to restore the duke and ordered not to accept Lu's bribes.

sentences.chinese: 申豐、汝賈許齊臣高龁、子將粟五千庾。
sentences.literal: Shen Feng, Ru Jia promised Qi ministers Gao Que, Zi Jiang grain five thousand yu.
sentences.idiomatic: Shen Feng and Ru Jia promised Qi's ministers Gao Que and Zi Jiang five thousand yu of grain.

sentences.chinese: 子將言於齊侯曰：「群臣不能事魯君，有異焉。
sentences.literal: Zi Jiang spoke at Qi Hou said: 'Ministers not able serve Lu ruler, have unusual.
sentences.idiomatic: Zi Jiang spoke to the Duke of Qi saying: "The ministers are unable to serve the Lu ruler. There is something unusual.

sentences.chinese: 宋元公為魯如晉，求內之，道卒。
sentences.literal: Song Yuan Gong for Lu went Jin, sought restore him, road died.
sentences.idiomatic: Duke Yuan of Song went to Jin on Lu's behalf to seek to restore him. He died en route.

sentences.chinese: 叔孫昭子求內其君，無病而死。
sentences.literal: Shu Sun Zhao Zi sought to restore his lord. He died without illness.
I do not know if heaven has abandoned Lu?
Or if the Lu ruler has offended the spirits?
I wish my lord to wait for now."
